Schedule

A preliminary schedule, subject to final approval from both participants and organizers

Day 1: February 24, 2025 (EMINES Conference Center)

Next Generation AI and Economic Applications

09:00 - 09:30
Welcome and Opening Speech
09:45 - 10:45
Generative AI: A Deep Dive into Diffusion Models
Eric Moulines, Professor, École Polytechnique (l’X)
11:00 - 12:00
An Alternative View on AI: Collaborative Learning, Incentives, and Social Welfare
Michael Jordan, Prof at University of California, Berkeley and MBZUAI, Researcher at Inria
12:30 - 14:00
Lunch
14:00 - 14:50
Diffusion Models at Work: Deep Prior for Inverse Problems
Eric Moulines, Professor, École Polytechnique (l’X)
15:00 - 16:00
Recent Advancements in AI and Major Challenges
Yann LeCun, Prof at Courant Institute NY and VP & Chief AI Scientist at Meta (ex Facebook)
16:10 - 17:10
Round Table 1: Bridging Theory and Applications in Next-Generation AI
Panelists:
  • Yann LeCun, Prof at Courant Institute NY and VP & Chief AI Scientist at Meta (ex Facebook)
  • Michael Jordan, Prof at University of California, Berkeley and MBZUAI, Researcher at Inria
Moderator: Eric Moulines
17:15 - 18:00
Poster Session

Day 2: February 25, 2025 (EMINES Conference Center)

Next Generation AI and Economic Applications

09:30 - 11:30
AI and Financial Applications
Charles-Albert Lehalle, Professor, École Polytechnique (l’X)
11:45 - 12:30
AI in Morocco
AI Movement
14:00 - 16:00
Socio-Economic Impact of Next-Generation AI
Benoit Bergeret, Co-founder, Hub France IA, OECD Network of Experts (ONE.AI)
Topics:
  • Transformation of Key Economic Sectors Through AI
  • Innovation and Economic Inequalities
  • Impact on Entrepreneurship and Technological Innovation
15:00 - 16:00
Round Table 2: "Enterprise: What’s the Real Value?” AI Consulting and Development Firm
Panelists:
  • Jawad Alaoui, Norma, Telecommunications and Digital Innovation Leader
  • Jean-François Thomas, Orange EMEA, Asset Management and Financial Technology Expert
  • Nabil Cherrat, Amundi, Investment Product Strategy Expert
Moderator: Benoit Bergeret
16:10 - 18:10
AI in Motion: The Future of Mobility + Best Projects Hackathon “Rail Summit” Exhibition
Luciano Borges, CEO SIANA (Moroccan Company for High-Speed Train Maintenance), and his team Young Innovators
